t: Key pad not working properly
s: I have replaced the product as first locker delivered with door jam. Replacement locker received but "0" & "#" key are not working. I am not able set password. I am surprised how come Amazon sells twice damaged product with out any inspection and this product is owned by Amazon.

t: If the car key rubber buttons pad is damaged, you can replace it with the key fob rubber pad for cars supplied by Minitools.
s: Minitools supplies several key rubber pads for many cars makes and models. Visit our store and find a wide range of replacement rubber buttons for remote keys.

t: American Science & Surplus Keypad Fix, Clean and Restore Conductivity to the Carbon on the Keys and the Copper PC Board Pads - Keypad Repair Kit - Amazon.com
s: Try this jar of Keypad Fix, designed to clean and restore conductivity to the carbon on the keys and the copper PC board pads that make up the rubber-coated switches on remotes, game controllers, and security keypads. Contains enough to coat over 200 button contacts. ... Amazon Brand - Presto!

t: How can a damaged key on an electronic keyboard be replaced without purchasing a new board? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Many keyboards have replaceable keys. In some you have to replace group of keys (like 2–8 keys) since they are connected together and form a unit. But in general you open the keyboard and unscrew the key(s) Many of the more known brands have spare parts to order.
